languages.text: "Не буду лгать, Ваша Светлость, вживую мы ее не видели. Не те чины мы носили, даже милость ее ниспослана была в обличьи грамоты, поданной рукой писца. Но мы помнили ее приказы, и они были полны отваги и рвения истинного Вольного Торговца".

"I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Не буду лгать, Ваша Светлость, вживую мы ее не видели. Не те чины мы носили, даже милость ее ниспослана была в обличьи грамоты, поданной рукой писца. Но мы помнили ее приказы, и они были полны отваги и рвения истинного Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the ranks. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remembered her orders, and those had been full of the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

"I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

languages.text: « Pour être tout à fait honnête, Votre Seigneurie, nous ne l'avons jamais rencontrée en personne. Notre rang ne nous le permettait pas. Lorsqu'elle nous a accordé ses faveurs, c'est l'un de ses scribes qui nous a remis le document déjà rédigé. Mais nous n'avons pas oublié ses ordres, qui reflétaient tout le courage et la ferveur d'une véritable libre-marchande. »
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Pour être tout à fait honnête, Votre Seigneurie, nous ne l'avons jamais rencontrée en personne. Notre rang ne nous le permettait pas. Lorsqu'elle nous a accordé ses faveurs, c'est l'un de ses scribes qui nous a remis le document déjà rédigé. Mais nous n'avons pas oublié ses ordres, qui reflétaient tout le courage et la ferveur d'une véritable libre-marchande. »

languages.text: «No le mentiré, mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca llegamos a verla en persona. No teníamos el rango necesario. Incluso cuando nos concedió su favor, fue mediante un documento redactado y entregado por un escriba. Pero recordamos sus órdenes, que reflejaban el valor y el fervor de una verdadera Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «No le mentiré, mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca llegamos a verla en persona. No teníamos el rango necesario. Incluso cuando nos concedió su favor, fue mediante un documento redactado y entregado por un escriba. Pero recordamos sus órdenes, que reflejaban el valor y el fervor de una verdadera Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「正直に言いますと、陛下、私達は彼の方に直接お目にかかったことはありません。階級を持っていませんでしたから。あの方のご厚意も、書記が書いて送った文書という形で受け取りました。しかし、あの方のご命令は覚えております。それは真の自由開拓者の勇気と熱意を映し出しておりました」
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言いますと、陛下、私達は彼の方に直接お目にかかったことはありません。階級を持っていませんでしたから。あの方のご厚意も、書記が書いて送った文書という形で受け取りました。しかし、あの方のご命令は覚えております。それは真の自由開拓者の勇気と熱意を映し出しておりました」

languages.text: “老实说，大人，我们从来没见过她本人，因为我们的军衔太低了。哪怕是她赐予我们的奖赏，也都是通过文件的形式，由缮写员抄录好传达过来，但她的命令我们记得很清楚。她的命令表明，她拥有真正的行商浪人必备的勇气与热情。”
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，大人，我们从来没见过她本人，因为我们的军衔太低了。哪怕是她赐予我们的奖赏，也都是通过文件的形式，由缮写员抄录好传达过来，但她的命令我们记得很清楚。她的命令表明，她拥有真正的行商浪人必备的勇气与热情。”

languages.text: "Ich werde nicht lügen, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, wir haben sie nie persönlich gesehen. Unser Rang war zu niedrig. Selbst ihre Gunst wurde uns in Form eines Dokuments zuteil, das ein Schreiber niedergelegt und überbracht hat. Aber wir erinnern uns an ihre Befehle, und sie zeugten von dem Mut und Eifer einer echten Freihändlerin."
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde nicht lügen, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, wir haben sie nie persönlich gesehen. Unser Rang war zu niedrig. Selbst ihre Gunst wurde uns in Form eines Dokuments zuteil, das ein Schreiber niedergelegt und überbracht hat. Aber wir erinnern uns an ihre Befehle, und sie zeugten von dem Mut und Eifer einer echten Freihändlerin."

languages.text: "Yalan söylemeyeceğim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, onunla bizzat karşılaşmadık. O kademede insanlar değildik. Lütfunu bize bir kâtibin kâğıda döküp ilettiği bir doküman olarak bahşettiğinde bile... Ancak verdiği emirleri hatırlıyoruz. Bu emirler, hakiki bir Hür Tacir'in sahip olduğu tüm cesareti ve coşkuyu yansıtıyordu."
languages.original_text: "I won't lie, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, we never saw her in person. We did not have the rank. Even her favour was bestowed on us in the form of a document penned and delivered by a scribe. But we remember her orders, and they were reflective of all the courage and fervour of a true Rogue Trader."
